page.title: 08FARMING(page2)
page.content: {Pendell Farm,}owned by Mr.Tobbit, grows corn and potatoes,and breeds beef cattle.The farm covers 200 acres. Public footpaths run through the land. {Priory Farm,}owned by Mr.Shinner, covers 120 acres.It lies on the green sand ridge with clay beneath.There are 14 different crops of soft fruit and vegetables picked by the public,16 acres of strawberries and 12 of raspberries.There are 2000 pigs, most Landrace hybrid, produced for a Belgian firm and boars are exported to many countries. There are 9 full-time employees, many part-time. {Lake Farm,}owned by Mr.Martin,covers 150 acres.25 acres were lost to M23 in 1972.There are 16 beef cows and their calves.Cereals, potatoes and grass are grown for grazing and hay.A contract machinery business is run:370 acres are managed on two other farms.
